summary: Defined core data types Grammar and Segment using typing.NamedTuple in lsysviz/types.py.

writes.content:
from typing import NamedTuple, Dict

class Grammar(NamedTuple):
    axiom: str
    rules: Dict[str, str]

class Segment(NamedTuple):
    x0: float
    y0: float
    x1: float
    y1: float
